message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,400,000. This is a fair price considering its value to you. Let me know your thoughts!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1,300,000 for your product. I hope this aligns better with my budget.

Bob, I understand your budget constraints. I'm willing to come down to $1,350,000. This is still a good deal for both of us, and it leaves room for a mutually beneficial agreement. Let me know what you think.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. I would like to counter with an offer of $1,325,000 for your product. I believe this price is fair for both parties involved.
